Question: DARAM INC. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
DARAM INC.

CES 2024

- Introducing the latest AI-powered smart home security system
- Features advanced facial recognition technology for enhanced security
- Equipped with 24/7 real-time monitoring and alerts for any suspicious activity
- Offers seamless integration with other smart home devices for a comprehensive security solution
Summary_cn:
DARAM INC.

CES 2024

-介绍最新的AI驱动智能家居安全系统
